data.lyric:
[ti:Come Back...Be Here (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Come Back...Be Here (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:02.02]Lyrics by：Dan Wilson/Taylor Swift
[00:04.04]Composed by：Dan Wilson/Taylor Swift
[00:06.06]You said it in a simple way
[00:09.34]4 AM the second day
[00:12.10]How strange that I don't know you at all
[00:15.87]
[00:18.29]Stumbled through the long goodbye
[00:21.30]One last kiss then catch your flight
[00:24.30]Right when I was just about to fall
[00:28.08]
[00:29.33]I told myself don't get attached
[00:32.30]But in my mind I play it back
[00:35.52]Spinning faster than the plane that took you
[00:41.83]
[00:42.94]And this is when the feeling sinks in
[00:46.04]I don't wanna miss you like this
[00:48.99]Come back be here come back be here
[00:54.93]I guess you're in New York today
[00:58.00]I don't wanna need you this way
[01:00.98]Come back be here come back be here
[01:07.11]
[01:12.21]The delicate beginning rush
[01:15.07]The feeling you can know so much
[01:18.27]Without knowing anything at all
[01:22.19]
[01:24.10]And now that I can put this down
[01:27.06]If I had known what I know now
[01:30.15]I never would've played so nonchalant
[01:34.03]
[01:35.42]Taxi cabs and busy streets
[01:38.15]That never bring you back to me
[01:41.36]I can't help but wish you took me with you
[01:48.35]
[01:48.99]And this is when the feeling sinks in
[01:52.00]I don't wanna miss you like this
[01:55.01]Come back be here come back be here
[02:00.94]I guess you're in London today
[02:03.97]And I don't wanna need you this way
[02:07.03]Come back be here come back be here
[02:12.83]
[02:24.62]This is falling in love in the cruelest way
[02:29.23]
[02:30.72]This is falling for you when you are worlds away
[02:36.80]In New York be here
[02:39.65]
[02:41.18]But you're in London and I break down
[02:45.64]'Cause it's not fair that you're not around
[02:48.96]This is when the feeling sinks in
[02:51.99]I don't wanna miss you like this
[02:55.04]Come back be here come back be here
[03:01.02]I guess you're in New York today
[03:03.87]And I don't wanna need you this way
[03:07.07]Come back be here come back be here
[03:13.11]Oh-oh oh-oh
[03:15.39]
[03:15.98]I don't wanna miss you like this
[03:19.06]Oh-oh oh-oh
[03:21.77]
[03:25.02]Come back be here
[03:27.65]
[03:31.01]Come back be here
data.trans:
[ti:Come Back...Be Here (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.02]//
[00:04.04]//
[00:06.06]你说得简洁干脆
[00:09.34]第二天的凌晨四点
[00:12.10]太奇怪了 我完全不认识你
[00:15.87]
[00:18.29]意识模糊度过无尽的离别
[00:21.30]最后一吻 你便赶去搭乘航班
[00:24.30]我就在崩溃边缘
[00:28.08]
[00:29.33]我告诫自己 不要沉迷于有你的世界
[00:32.30]但记忆却在脑海重现
[00:35.52]速度比你搭乘的飞机还要快
[00:41.83]
[00:42.94]感觉沉沦
[00:46.04]我不想这般思念你
[00:48.99]回来吧 回来这里
[00:54.93]我想 你今天应该到了纽约
[00:58.00]我不想这般需要你
[01:00.98]回来吧 回来这里
[01:07.11]
[01:12.21]小心翼翼地开始 结局却如此仓促
[01:15.07]你很熟悉这种感受
[01:18.27]却又浑然不觉
[01:22.19]
[01:24.10]而此刻 我能将这一切都放下
[01:27.06]如果彼时的我 知晓此时的一切
[01:30.15]我绝不会 冷漠不言
[01:34.03]
[01:35.42]来来往往的的士 熙熙攘攘的街道
[01:38.15]都无法将你带回我身边
[01:41.36]我无能为力 只能祈祷你带我一起离去
[01:48.35]
[01:48.99]感觉沉沦
[01:52.00]我不想这般思念你
[01:55.01]回来吧 回来这里
[02:00.94]我想 你今天应该在伦敦
[02:03.97]我不想这般需要你
[02:07.03]回来吧 回来这里
[02:12.83]
[02:24.62]这是相爱最残忍的方式
[02:29.23]
[02:30.72]当你在世界的另一端 俘获了我的心 
[02:36.80]我在纽约 回来这里
[02:39.65]
[02:41.18]但是你在伦敦 我已经崩溃
[02:45.64]你不在我身边 痛苦不堪
[02:48.96]感觉沉沦
[02:51.99]我不想这般思念你
[02:55.04]回来吧 回来这里
[03:01.02]我想 你今天应该到了纽约
[03:03.87]我不想这般需要你
[03:07.07]回来吧 回来这里
[03:13.11]//
[03:15.39]
[03:15.98]我不想这般思念你
[03:19.06]//
[03:21.77]
[03:25.02]回来这里
[03:27.65]
[03:31.01]回来这里
